group.name: connection
group.description: Define the required connection configurations to initiate communication with the SaaS provider.

field.name: cn.providerUrl
field.description: The native provider endpoint target for the connection configuration

group.name: oauth_v20_jwt
group.description: Define configurations needed for the OAuth version 2.0 authentication scheme.

group.name: custom
group.description: Define any custom configurations specific to the SaaS provider.

resource.name: create
resource.description: Create a new object.

parameter.name: objectName
parameter.description: Create selected object information.

parameter.name: requestDataSource
parameter.description: Set to true if you have selected dataset businessObject and want Catalog to create a dataSource on your behalf; otherwise, pass a dataSourceId in the body.

resource.name: update
resource.description: Update an existing object by id.

map.name: if_match
map.description: Set to verify the valid versions of document to be modified by matching the updated date.

map.name: if_none_match
map.description: Set to verify the invalid versions of document to be modified by matching the updated date.

map.name: accept_encoding
map.description: Used to signal the intent to consume compressed response bodies. Supported encodings: gzip.

parameter.name: objectName
parameter.description: Update selected object information.

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: Selected object id.

resource.name: patch
resource.description: Update one or more attributes of an object specified by id.

map.name: if_match
map.description: Set to verify the valid versions of document to be modified by matching the updated date.

map.name: if_none_match
map.description: Set to verify the invalid versions of document to be modified by matching the updated date.

map.name: accept_encoding
map.description: Used to signal the intent to consume compressed response bodies. Supported encodings: gzip.

parameter.name: objectName
parameter.description: Patch selected object information.

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: Selected object id.

resource.name: deleteRecord
resource.description: Update one or more attributes of an object specified by id.

map.name: accept_encoding
map.description: Used to signal the intent to consume compressed response bodies. Supported encodings: gzip.

parameter.name: objectName
parameter.description: Patch selected object information.

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: Selected object id.

resource.name: createByID
resource.description: Creates a new account or connection.

map.name: accept_encoding
map.description: Used to signal the intent to consume compressed response bodies. Supported encodings: gzip.

map.name: location
map.description: The URI of the newly created resource.

parameter.name: objectName
parameter.description: Create selected object information.

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: Selected object id.

resource.name: query
resource.description: Query records based on criteria.

parameter.name: objectName
parameter.description: Query selected object information.

resource.name: get
resource.description: Get an object record by Id.

map.name: accept_encoding
map.description: Used to signal the intent to consume compressed response bodies. Supported encodings: gzip.

parameter.name: objectName
parameter.description: Get selected object information.

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: Object ID

resource.name: create
resource.description: Create a new object.

parameter.name: objectName
parameter.description: Get selected object information.

resource.name: createBaseConnection
resource.description: Create a new connection.

parameter.name: objectName
parameter.description: Get selected object information.

resource.name: query
resource.description: Query records based on criteria.

parameter.name: objectName
parameter.description: Get selected object information.

parameter.name: property
parameter.description: A comma separated list of top-level object properties to be returned in the response.

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: Limit response to a specific number of objects.

parameter.name: orderby
parameter.description: Sort response by specified fields

parameter.name: continuationToken
parameter.description: A token for fetching records for next page.

parameter.name: count
parameter.description: A boolean value specifying if the count of resources should be returned.

resource.name: get
resource.description: Get an object record by Id.

map.name: accept_encoding
map.description: Used to signal the intent to consume compressed response bodies. Supported encodings: gzip.

parameter.name: objectName
parameter.description: Get selected object information.

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: Object ID

resource.name: exploreBaseConnection
resource.description: Explore files and directories

parameter.name: BASE_CONNECTION_ID
parameter.description: Base connection id.

parameter.name: objectType
parameter.description: The type of object that you wish to explore.

parameter.name: object
parameter.description: This parameter is required only when viewing a specific directory.

service.name: dataAccessAPI
service.description: Data Access Service facilitates data access and egress on Adobe Experience Platform.

map.name: Content_Type
map.description: The Content-Type entity header is used to indicate the media type of the resource.

resource.name: getDatasetFilesByBatchId
resource.displayName: Get Dataset Files By Batch Id
resource.description: List all dataset files under a batch.

parameter.name: batchId
parameter.description: Batch ID

parameter.name: start
parameter.description: Paging parameter to specify start of new page. E.g, start=1

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: Paging parameter to specify number of results per page. E.g, limit=10

resource.name: getFailedBatchByBatchId
resource.displayName: Get Failed Batch By Batch Id
resource.description: List all files under failed batch.

parameter.name: batchId
parameter.description: Batch ID

parameter.name: start
parameter.description: Paging parameter to specify start of new page. E.g, start=1

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: Paging parameter to specify number of results per page. E.g, limit=10

parameter.name: path
parameter.description: Full file name of file under partition identified by File Identifier. The contents of the file would be downloaded if this parameter is provided. E.g, profiles.csv

resource.name: getHeadersOfdatasetFile
resource.displayName: Get headers of a dataset file
resource.description: Retrieves headers in response with a file’s metadata. The response header will indicate information regarding the specified file.

parameter.name: dataSetFileId
parameter.description: File Identifier

parameter.name: path
parameter.description: Full file name of file under partition identified by File Identifier. E.g, profiles.csv

resource.name: getDatasetFileMetadataByDatasetFileId
resource.description: Returns either a complete file, or a directory of chunked data that make up the file. The response contains a data array that may contain a single entry, or a list of files belonging to that directory.

parameter.name: dataSetFileId
parameter.description: File Identifier

parameter.name: start
parameter.description: Paging parameter to specify start of new page. E.g, start=fileName.csv

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: Paging parameter to specify number of results per page. E.g, limit=10

resource.name: getDatasetFileData
resource.description: Returns either a complete file, or a directory of chunked data that make up the file.

map.name: Content_Type
map.description: The Content-Type entity header is used to indicate the media type of the resource.

map.name: Range
map.description: Range of bytes requested. E.g, Range: bytes=0-100000

map.name: Content_Range
map.description: Range of bytes sent by the server. Can be different from what user requested. E.g, Content-Range: bytes 0-100/124000

map.name: Content_Length
map.description: Size of payload (bytes) in the response.

parameter.name: dataSetFileId
parameter.description: File Identifier

parameter.name: path
parameter.description: Full file name of file under partition identified by File Identifier. The contents of the file would be downloaded if this parameter is provided. E.g, profiles.csv

resource.name: preview
resource.description: Preview the first 100 rows of CSV or Parquet files.

parameter.name: datasetId
parameter.description: DataSet ID

resource.name: create
resource.description: Creates a new batch/inlet.

parameter.name: objectName1
parameter.description: Valid values: foundation(for batch) and core(for inlet)

parameter.name: objectName2
parameter.description: Valid values: import(for batch) and edge(for inlet)

parameter.name: objectName
parameter.description: create selected object information.

resource.name: completeBatch
resource.description: Complete the batch to trigger the downstream data promotion workflow.

parameter.name: batchId
parameter.description: The ID of the batch that needs to be updated.

parameter.name: action
parameter.description: The action to take on the batch.

resource.name: uploadSimpleFileAsStream
resource.description: Upload file to a dataset in a batch.

parameter.name: batchId
parameter.description: The ID of the batch data is being uploaded to.

parameter.name: datasetId
parameter.description: The ID of the dataset data is being uploaded to.

parameter.name: fileName
parameter.description: The complete path of the file. Note that the directory structure denoted in this path is preserved and can be used to denote partitions that the file data belongs to.

resource.name: uploadSimpleFile
resource.description: Upload file to a dataset in a batch.

parameter.name: batchId
parameter.description: The ID of the batch data is being uploaded to.

parameter.name: datasetId
parameter.description: The ID of the dataset data is being uploaded to.

parameter.name: fileName
parameter.description: The complete path of the file. Note that the directory structure denoted in this path is preserved and can be used to denote partitions that the file data belongs to.

resource.name: uploadFilePart
resource.description: Upload file part to a resumable file being uploaded to a batch dataset.

parameter.name: batchId
parameter.description: The ID of the batch data is being uploaded to.

parameter.name: datasetId
parameter.description: The ID of the dataset data is being uploaded to.

parameter.name: fileName
parameter.description: The complete path of the file. Note that the directory structure denoted in this path is preserved and can be used to denote partitions that the file data belongs to.

resource.name: completeFileUpload
resource.description: Used to signal intialization and completion of the file that’s uploaded in parts.

parameter.name: batchId
parameter.description: The ID of the batch data is being uploaded to.

parameter.name: datasetId
parameter.description: The ID of the dataset data is being uploaded to.

parameter.name: fileName
parameter.description: The complete path of the file. Note that the directory structure denoted in this path is preserved and can be used to denote partitions that the file data belongs to.

parameter.name: action
parameter.description: The action to perform on the file with the supported values currently being INITIALIZE and COMPLETE.

resource.name: queryInlet
resource.description: Query inlets.

parameter.name: dataType
parameter.description: Available values : raw, xdm

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: The name you want to use for your data inlet.

parameter.name: sourceId
parameter.description: A meaningful identifier or name of the source sending the streaming data.

parameter.name: status
parameter.description: Available values : active, inactive

parameter.name: location
parameter.description: Location of destination.

parameter.name: authenticationRequired
parameter.description: Having this set to true requires that calls carry an Authorization token when sending data to the inlet.

resource.name: getInlet
resource.description: Get inlet by id.

parameter.name: inletId
parameter.description: The ID of the data inlet you want to retrieve.

resource.name: updateInlet
resource.description: Update inlet by ID.

parameter.name: inletId
parameter.description: The ID of the data inlet you want to update.

resource.name: deleteInlet
resource.description: Delete inlet by id.

parameter.name: inletId
parameter.description: The ID of the data inlet you want to delete.

resource.name: preview
resource.description: Generates data preview for the files uploaded to the batch so far. The preview could be generated for all the batch datasets collectively or per selected datasets.

parameter.name: batchId
parameter.description: The ID of the batch data is being uploaded to.

parameter.name: datasetId
parameter.description: The ID of the dataset data is being uploaded to.

parameter.name: format
parameter.description: The file format for the uploaded file.

parameter.name: delimiter
parameter.description: The delimiter to use for parsing column values,

parameter.name: quote
parameter.description: The quote value to use while parsing.

parameter.name: escape
parameter.description: The escape character to use while parsing.

parameter.name: charset
parameter.description: The encoding to use for parsing.

parameter.name: header
parameter.description: The flag to indicate if the header is supplied in the dataset files. Currently headerless files aren’t supported and the header flag should always be true. This is kept for future implementation.

parameter.name: nrow
parameter.description: The number of rows to parse.

resource.name: create
resource.description: Creates a new object.

parameter.name: objectName
parameter.description: create selected object information.

parameter.name: containerId
parameter.description: Valid values: foundation(for batch) and core(for inlet)

resource.name: update
resource.description: Replace a tenant-defined resource type.

parameter.name: containerId
parameter.description: Container ID (eg. tenant or global).

parameter.name: resourceType
parameter.description: Replace selected object information.

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: The resource meta:altId or URL encoded $id URI.

resource.name: patch
resource.description: Modify or update part of a tenant-defined resource type.

parameter.name: containerId
parameter.description: Container ID (eg. tenant or global).

parameter.name: resourceType
parameter.description: Replace selected object information.

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: The resource meta:altId or URL encoded $id URI.

resource.name: get
resource.description: Retrieve a specific selected resource by its unique ID.

parameter.name: containerId
parameter.description: Container ID (eg. tenant or global).

parameter.name: resourceType
parameter.description: Replace selected object information.

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: The resource meta:altId or URL encoded $id URI.

resource.name: query
resource.description: Query records based on criteria.

parameter.name: containerId
parameter.description: Container ID (eg. tenant or global).

parameter.name: resourceType
parameter.description: Replace selected object information.

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: Specify a limit for the number of response results to be displayed (must be between 0 and 500).

parameter.name: orderby
parameter.description: Sort response by specified fields separated by “,” and/or prefix field with "-" for descending order.

parameter.name: start
parameter.description: The start value of the first orderBy field. Start value matches values in orderBy field (eg. strings or integers)

parameter.name: properties
parameter.description: A comma separated whitelist of top-level object properties to be returned in the response. Used to cut down the number of properties and amount of data returned in the response bodies.

resource.name: deleteRecord
resource.description: Deletes selected record.

parameter.name: containerId
parameter.description: Container ID(eg. tenant or global)

parameter.name: resourceType
parameter.description: Object to be deleted.

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: Id of the selected object.

resource.name: stats
resource.description: Return tenant id and Schema Registry usage information.

resource.name: streamingIngestion
resource.description: Publish messages to Adobe Experience Platform using the inlet ID.

parameter.name: collection
parameter.description: Specify the path.

parameter.name: inletId
parameter.description: The ID of the data inlet you want to delete.

parameter.name: debug
parameter.description: boolean values.

parameter.name: synchronousValidation
parameter.description: An optional query parameter intended for development purposes. Can be used for immediate feedback to determine if the request was successfully sent

resource.name: streamingBatchIngestion
resource.description: Publish messages to Adobe Experience Platform using the inlet ID.

parameter.name: collection
parameter.description: Specify the path.

parameter.name: inletId
parameter.description: The ID of the data inlet you want to delete.

parameter.name: debug
parameter.description: boolean values.

parameter.name: synchronousValidation
parameter.description: An optional query parameter intended for development purposes. Can be used for immediate feedback to determine if the request was successfully sent

resource.name: listSandboxes
resource.description: List sandboxes from Adobe Platform.
